meta.description: Bojan Istvancic is frontend developer from Serbia.This portfolio shows his knowledge, experience and his development.

home.about-me-text: Frontend developer with more than 4 years of professional experience building and maintaining digital products. I am a dedicated, organized and methodical individual. I have good interpersonal skills, an excellent team worker, very willing to learn and develop new skills. I am reliable, dependable and often seek new responsibilities. I have an active, dynamic approach to work and getting things done. I am determined and decisive. I identify and develop opportunities.
home.projects-project-1-description: Presentational website displaying some of the projects and technologies that I am using.
home.projects-project-2-description: Frontend for Matko Vuković - full stack app that contains presentational part and administration.
home.projects-project-3-description: Backend for Matko Vuković - API written in nodejs (express).
home.contact-get-in-touch-text: My inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I will try my best to get back to you!

footer.label-3: Thanks to freepick for free assets
